message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $155. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $140. Can you consider that?
I understand that $140 is still a bit low for me, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $147. It's the best I can do, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $142.50. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation rounds, Bob. However, I'm still willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $145. It's the best I can do, considering the product's value.
I understand your concerns, Alice. I'm willing to make a final offer. I'll meet you halfway again and offer $142.25. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $148. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product.
I understand your concerns, Alice. However, I'm not willing to go above $142. I've already stretched my budget to the limit. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
